DOC.brief_summary: Patients subject : A . Clinical evaluation include history examination B. Ultrasonographic evaluation Ovarian Morphometry : - Patients evaluate early follicular phase menstrual flow ( cycle 's day 1-3 ) TVS scanning ; use MINDRAY DP-1100 Plus Digital Machine , 7.5MHz , China , one examiner avoid inter-observer variation . - Ovarian image procure sagittal coronal plane frozen image reflect large ovarian dimension utilized measurement ovarian length , width , height ( cm ) per standard clinical practice . Mean value ovary use . Ovarian volume calculate ellipsoid volume formula , { Ovarian volume = Ovarian Width ( D1 ) × Ovarian Length ( D2 ) ×Ovarian Height ( D3 ) × 0 .523 } - Antral follicle count determine patient C. Laboratory Evaluation : Blood sample collect early follicular phase . Samples immediately centrifuge serum save -20 degree measurement : - Anti Mullerian Hormone ( AMH ) - Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) - Estradiol ( E2 ) Using electro-chemiluminescence immunoassay ( ELICA )

Ultrasonographic evaluation Ovarian Morphometry : - Patients evaluate early follicular phase menstrual flow ( cycle 's day 1-3 ) TVS scanning ; use MINDRAY DP-1100 Plus Digital Machine , 7.5MHz , China , one examiner avoid inter-observer variation . - Ovarian image procure sagittal coronal plane frozen image reflect large ovarian dimension utilized measurement ovarian length , width , height ( cm ) per standard clinical practice .
